description: Amendments to planning permission dated 5th June 2024 (RN 23/08666/FULL) for, 'Demolition and replacement of the single storey roof structure; infill of a ground floor lightwell to the south of the rear podium section and erection of one additional storey on the podium section; creation of a new internal ground floor courtyard; alterations and recladding of the east façade including PV brickwork; creation of new entrance, access ramps and planters to the west facade on Bryanston Square; incorporation of new solar blinds; and installation of solar panels and green roofs and other planting at roof level; Replacement of main entrance doors and glazing on north and west elevations. Internal alterations at all floor levels' (SITE INCLUDES 21 BRYANSTON SQUARE); NAMELY, a revised façade design and one part of the description of development to remove reference to PV brickwork.
